title: Drone Remote Control Prank
description:
Remote Control for All DRONE, converts easily your Android phone into a remote control for drone. It's simple and easy to configure and use RC Drone. We created Drone Remote Control with a single premise, to help you get control of any drone including drone with camera, quadcopter or mini drone big or small drones. Remote Control For All Drones is a free application to control your drone functions through easy functionality of this drone app. Simply install Drone Remote Control app it will help you pretending control any kind of drone, drone camera, any parrot drone or any quadcopter for that matter. Install Drone Remote Control app prank Once you do that, you will be able acting to remotely control any kind of flying drones in your area using this cool free app!! It will be so easy to remote control any mini drone or even the best drones, included the larger ones which make one of the best remote control drone game with all the included features that no other r/c remote control drone does have it.

 How To Use Drone Remote Control Prank

How to Configure Drone Remote Control for all

1- Enter The drone remote control app
2- Select your drone category
3- Select your drone model remote control 
4- The right RC Drone will be downloaded
5- Start remote controlling all flying drones

Do you want to get control of your friends drones? now you can do that with Drone Remote Control this is when the real fun will start to happen.

If you know a drone owner and want to pull a prank on him, then this is the ultimate way
to do it. Use this app only for entertainment. your can show this app to your friends and family to fool them and make them believe that you are able to control their drone using only your smart-phone. Make your friends believe that you can control all drone brands from you mobile just with view taps!!

What if you could control all your drones with your Android device? Try this amazing and Free Drone Remote Control App to turn your android device into a drone remote control drone. This app is really easy to configure for your drone and is really easy-to-use. The “Drone Remote Control App” will allow you to experience a real drone remote experience. Our app supports most Drones brands and models. Whether you have a HUBSAN, Syma Toys, Viper de ciel, Ehang, Cheerson, Hobbico, Parrot, Tello, Havic or any other branded Drone, you can always convert your android device to a remote for your drone.

Drone Remote Control is prank app it's not real Drone Remote it is only fun game for your child. Simulator for entertainment only. If you have enjoyed Drone Remote Control for all for fun and prank with friends, do not forget to rate us on play store.

PS: This is just a prank app to troll your friends and family members!!

This Drone Remote Control app prank display all major drone brands so you can show people that you can remotely control all kind of drones and that you can turn your android device easily to an universal drone flight controller and drone remote control drone rc.

Thank you so much for installing this drone remote control app for android prank and if you enjoy using it PLEASE support us with rating and Thank you.
